title: Netanyahu's Iran warning hits its target: Trump
text:
Netanyahu's Iran warning hits its target: Trump 12:10pm EDT - 01:54
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's one-man show accusing Iran of lying about its nuclear weapons failed to persuade many experts there was a 'smoking gun'. But some say that doesn't matter - its target audience was one man: Donald Trump. Reuters' Stephen Farrell reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's one-man show accusing Iran of lying about its nuclear weapons failed to persuade many experts there was a 'smoking gun'. But some say that doesn't matter - its target audience was one man: Donald Trump. Reuters' Stephen Farrell reports.
